bibl.title: On the Hector of Astydamas.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Astydamas' Hector: fragments: fragment **1h? [P. Hibeh II, 174 verso (= M.-P.3 1963.1; LDAB 10833)]; - fragment **1i? [P. Amh. II, 10 (= M.-P.3 169; LDAB 425)]; - fragment 2; fragment **2a? [P. Stras. Inv. W.G. 304 (= M.-P.3 170; LDAB 1051)]. - 3. Astydamas' Hector: thoughts on reconstruction. - 4. Is Trag. Adesp. fragment 649 [P. Oxy. XXXVI, 2746 (= M.-P.3 171.1; LDAB 423)] from Astydamas' Hector? - 5. An Apulian volute-crater and Astydamas' Hector. - 6. Epilogue. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Vayos Liapis, On the Hector of Astydamas.
